name: Osteopenia
title: Osteopenia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  osteopenia.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of specified and unspecified disorders of bones and cartilage associated with osteopenia of prematurity, drug-induced osteopenia, and senile osteopenia.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represents a diagnosis of arrest of bone development or growth, chondromalacia, or stress fracture of bone.)
